item.title: D2023R3-12588 Support Practice Leader-34897 - Support Practice Leader H/M
item.description:
Descripci√≥n puesto :
We need to onboard a Service Management Specialist, you will be responsible for making SCIB's services and framework meet the needs of the domains and enable strategic business objectives to be achieved. It will do this by ensuring that the implementation of the process is aligned with the defined standards and procedures. We need someone like you to help us on different fronts: - Understanding of the concepts and functions of the Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL), to be able to apply those concepts with a practical approach. (Processes are the path, not the goal) - Manage problem investigations to ensure the root cause is correctly identified and an improvement plan is implemented. - Validates that incident and problem tickets in Service Now are logged according to defined best practices, to support data quality. - Develop and maintain good relationships with SCIB domains to act as interface between business and IT teams. - Define indicators that allow measuring the quality of the service and enable decision-making based on data. - Analyze processes and recommend improvements, to ensure continuous improvements. - Ensure that the process documentation is at the best quality level. - Lead the transformation in the way of working throughout our organization.

SPECIFIC SKILLS OF THE JOB The candidate is expected to have practical experience implementing IT processes and best practice standards across the organization. Experience in process improvement, based on Data Driven Model. Demonstrable experience changing the IT operations process and the definition and implementation of KPI's. SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE Be innovative and creative, to suggest actions for improvement. Knowledge of Six Sigma, Kaizen, Lean Think outside the box Problem analysis and resolution capabilities. Have good communication and collaboration skills. Being able to adapt and accept change. Being able to deal with complexity and uncertainty Have a good level of English Management of teams and stakeholders Knowledge of Spanish is an advantage EDUCATION Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Computer Engineering or similar. Master's degree in finance, business or computer science is a plus EXPERIENCE Have experience reporting and analyzing KPI's Have experience documenting processes and procedures

item.title: D2023R3-12586 PO-Business Analyst-34888 - Product Owner/Business Analyst Confirming H/M
item.description:
Descripci√≥n puesto :
As part of the GTB Confirming product team team's, main tasks for the Business Analyst will include: ¬∑ Participation in projects for software development using Agile techniques. ¬∑ Supporting the product owner with decision making, serving as the 'bridge' between developers and product stakeholders. ¬∑ Analysing and helping to translate business needs into user stories and drawing processes. ¬∑ Foresee customer journeys and business processes, anticipating requirements and uncovering areas for improvement. ¬∑ Ensure solutions meet business needs and requirements ¬∑ Update products' functional documentation and explain new concepts to non-technical users. ¬∑ Testing responsibilities: support the SDET in the testing scenario generation and testing data/files creation plus lead the UAT (define & perform the user acceptance testing as well as report bugs and testing results) ¬∑ Effectively communicate insights and plans to cross-functional team members

SKILLS: - Agile Methodologies. - Userlevel knowledge JIRA, ALM (Application Life-cycle Management) and Microsoft Teams tools. - Highly fluent in English: both written and spoken. - Excellent communications skills. - Proactive and Oriented to results. - Good change management. - Spanish would be a plus. - Supply chain finance products (Confirming, Dynamic Discounting,...) would be a plus. - Payment methods and accounting knowledge would be a plus. - Automated testing (Selenium) experience would be a plus

item.title: D2023R3-12584 CRM Specialist Santander-34887 - CRM Especialist H/M
item.description:
Descripci√≥n puesto :
As CRM, you will build and maintain good relationship with the SCIB countries that we provide service to. You will invest time to know the countries, to understand their requirement and you will communicate those needs to the SCIB production team and domains. You will provide promptly update on the ongoing incidents and problems the countries are having. You will act as the single point of contact between countries and SCIB Productions teams. We need someone like you to help us in different fronts: Act a liaison between countries and SCIB Production Team Resolve and attend countries requirements quickly and efficiently. Keep countries updated on ongoing incident and problems status. Understand your customer needs Define improvements to meet specific customer needs. Identify areas to improve, by analyzing CSAT, NPS Score. Running the country Service Review meetings.

EXPERIENCE Experience in lead service review meetings and present the key indicators. Experience in tracking the customer satisfaction and identify actions to ensure is maintaining at the expected level. Experience defining CSAT and NPS Score. Experience in manage communication with different Stakeholders. EDUCATION Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information System, IT Engineering or similar. Master's degree in finance, Business or Computer Science is an advantage SKILLS & KNOWLEDGE Business minded Excellent interpersonal and communicational skills A great team player Be passionate on customer satisfaction. Be able to deal with complexity and uncertainty Be able to adapt & embrace change. Fluent in English. Knowledge of Spanish is an advantage JOB-SPECIFIC COMPETENCIES The candidate is expected to have hands-on experience implementing a CRM framework across SCIB. Define and implement a CSAT and NPS framework. Built a strong relation with customers and CIB IT teams, to ensure an excellent communication flow among the parties.

item.title: D2023R3-12526 WAN Expert-34786 - WAN Expert H/M
item.description:
Descripci√≥n puesto :
Act as a key resource for the troubleshooting of any network-related problems that may arise. ‚Ä¢ Proactively identify potential problems and improvements that can be made within LAN and WAN environments. ‚Ä¢ Work with vendors where required to provide effective incident resolution. ‚Ä¢ Architect wide area and ultra low latency networks, Participate in the design of scalable and secure networking solutions for the enterprise. ‚Ä¢ Technically support projects from initial conception through implementation, offering assistance and recommendations where required. ‚Ä¢ Maintain detailed network documentation. ‚Ä¢ Play a key role in the design and implementation of tools and process to proactively monitor network availability, performance, and security. ‚Ä¢ Work with vendors and purchasers to procure network products and services. ‚Ä¢ Research new network technology and advancements to provide recommendations for ongoing improvement to the enterprise.

Skills: -WAN -Routing: OSPF, BGP -LAN -VPNs CISCO -Ansible ‚Ä¢ You have strong Network engineering and project delivery experience ‚Ä¢ You have an Excellent operating knowledge of common LAN and WAN technologies, demonstrable experience supporting complex layer 2 and 3 topologies in data center environments. ‚Ä¢ You have advanced knowledge of routing and switching protocols; IPv4, OSPF, MP-BGP, MPLS ‚Ä¢ You have strong experience with Multicast: PIM, RP, MSDP, IGMP and MDT ‚Ä¢ You have Minimum three-years experience as a network administrator in a multi-location Cisco-oriented LAN and WAN environment. ‚Ä¢ Cisco - SD-WAN (formally Viptella) - practical experience with design and some aspects of implementation using Cisco SD-WAN ‚Ä¢ You have an excellent operating knowledge of Cisco IOS/NXOS command line interface. Cisco certification as an asset. ‚Ä¢ You have an expert knowledge of network monitoring PCAP decoding tools landscape (Corvil, SFlow, timestamping (PTP) ‚Ä¢ You have scripting and automation experience (Python preferred) ‚Ä¢ Operational familiarity with DNS technology, specifically: Infoblox. ‚Ä¢ Excellent written and spoken English communication ‚Ä¢ Must be available to work outside of office hours and weekends. ‚Ä¢ Participation in an on-call rota will be required.

Conocimientos t√©cnicos en: Administraci√≥n cabinas de almacenamiento instaladas en el Banco en el entorno de Mainframe: EMC VMAX. Soporte al plan de contingencia (swap de discos entre los centros). Aplicaci√≥n de PTFs en los productos de almacenamiento instalados en el Mainframe. Soporte a copias entre discos para tareas de migraci√≥n mediante la herramienta de IBM TDMF.
